Room.Name: Wakeforest Drive/Netherworld Lane Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Wakeforest Drive and Netherworld Lane.
Room.LongDescription: You are getting close to the easternmost borders of the city, which lie but a block to the east. Wakeforest Drive runs north and south through the eastern section of the city, past the Wakarimasu Parks. Netherworld Lane runs east and west past the main entrance of the city's Necropolis towards the center of town.
